summary.p: Asks for Zwingli's opinion on Christ's descent into hell.

div.p: Grace and peace from the Lord.

I earnestly ask you, my dear Zwingli, to briefly open your mind to me and explain what it means that we confess Christ descended into hell. For there are not a few among the learned today who invent strange things here, meanwhile tormenting themselves no less and leaving eager readers unsatisfied.
To Huldrych Zwingli, dearest brother in the Lord.
